overview: Zombie horror entertainment from around the world with this collection of more than 2 hours of gory tales of the undead. Thrills, chills and gut spills galore, plenty for any zombie fan to devour. This anthology includes festival hits Dead Hungry and Zombies & Cigarettes, along with the chic Paris By Night of the Living Dead, British military zombie film Zomblies, and many more.
title: Ultimate Zombie Feast
